text: Crystal Lynn Bowersox (Born August 4, 1985, in Elliston, Ohio) is an American singer-songwriter and actress. She was the runner-up in the ninth season of American Idol. Her debut album was Farmer's Daughter, released in 2010. She was diagnosed with diabetes when she was age 6 and has been hospitalized several times since. == References == ==Other websites== Category:American rock singers Category:American soul musicians Category:Country musicians from Ohio Category:American blues musicians Category:American blues singers Category:American country singers Category:American gospel singers Category:American gospel musicians Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Singers from Ohio Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Toledo, Ohio Category:Musicians from Toledo, Ohio Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:American Idol contestants Category:American soul singers
title: Crystal Bowersox
